ACTS RETIREMENT-LIFE COMMUNITIES, INC.
v.
TOWN OF COLUMBUS 334PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 14, 2018 Ryan D. Bolick, Attorney at Law, Virginia M. Wooten, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Town of Columbus, North Carolina. Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Stephen V. Carey, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for ACTS Retirement-Life Communities, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of February 2018 by Defendant Supplemental Reply:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of February 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 26th day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
